comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Florida Memory / State Library & Archives of Florida has a cool brochure of the Tampa Municipal Trailer Park from the 1930s.  (Violet Holtzman is described as the "hostess".)  Rates were 35¢ per day -- for two people, or $1.50 per week. "No laundry work is to be done on Sunday" ;)

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pixelwrangler] Thank you once again for your expert knowledge! We liked your comment so much, we decided to post the brochure.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Ha ha ;)  — all the credit (and expert knowledge) goes to Google!  It does all the work and finds all the cool stuff (that others have put in the time to get on the web).
